mapper.select: select rno,bno,reply,replyer,replyDate,updateDate from(select /*+INDEX_DESC(spring_reply idx_reply)*/ rownum rnum,rno,bno,reply,replyer,replyDate,updateDate from spring_reply where bno=#{bno} and rno>0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rnum > (#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount}
mapper.update: update spring_reply set reply=#{reply},updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from spring_reply where bno=#{bno}
